## Minimal

```{r te-setup}
# Load the xml2 package
library(xml2)

#Path to xml file
path_xml <- "data/T-E.xml"
```

```{r te-function, file="convert-xml-to-html.R"}
```


```{r te-minimal, results='asis'}
# PRINT "MINIMAL" VERSION
convert_xml_to_html(
  xml_file = path_xml,
  version_name = "minimal",
  min_line = 613,
  max_line = 702
)
```
